com.github.valid8j.pcond.core.fluent.builtins

Interface ObjectTransformer<T,E>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the target value of the instance of this interface.
    E - The type of the target value of the checker instance. In most cases, the same type as T is chosen.
    All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractObjectTransformer<ObjectTransformer<T,E>,ObjectChecker<T,E>,T,E>, Matcher<ObjectTransformer<T,E>,T,E>, Statement<T>, Transformer<ObjectTransformer<T,E>,ObjectChecker<T,E>,T,E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ObjectTransformer.Impl

    public interface ObjectTransformer<T,E>
extends AbstractObjectTransformer<ObjectTransformer<T,E>,ObjectChecker<T,E>,T,E>

    This interface is used for object whose type doesn’t have an explicit support. Do not try to extend/implement this class to support your own class.

      • asString

        default StringTransformer<T> asString()

        Lets the framework know the value to be checked is a String. This method may throw an exception, if the value is not a String.

        Returns:
        A <T> object.

      • create

        static <E> ObjectTransformer<E,E> create(Supplier<E> value)

        Creates a new Object transformer whose target value is given by a supplier.

        Type Parameters:
        E - The type of the target value.
        Parameters:
        value - A supplier of the target value.
        Returns:
        Created transformer.
